FuncDef:
The qos cos pack-size command sets the packet block threshold size.
The undo qos cos pack-size command restores the default settings.
By default,the packet block threshold size is not set.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a queue priority.
The value can be EF, AF1, AF2, AF3, AF4, BE, CS6, or CS7.

Specifies the packet block threshold size. The larger the value is, the higher the traffic burst can be.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 5, in KBytes.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In most cases, using the default configuration is recommended. If the packet block threshold size needs to be set to control the traffic burst, contact technical support personnel for configuration guide.
